div.bibl: Lietuva, July 14, 1911. THE 4th OF JULY PARADE(Summary)

body.p: This year, the celebration of the 4th of July was the finest in Chicago's history.
This year, the Lithuanians starred in the parade..... The Lithuanian float was better and more beautifully decorated than that of any other nationality.....
"The float showed how the Grand Duke Gedeminas took the castle of Kiev. It was followed by various societies such as, the Duke Vytautas Society, the Algirdas Society and the Mindaugis soldiers."
The Lithuanians devoted much energy and time to the making of this beautiful float for the parade.
